attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All or most of the public would like the Prime Minister.to ratify the expences and salaries of those MPs who knowingly stole money from the public purse threw filing fauls claims on there expences. We the public would also like to see all MPs who have gained second homes threw the allowance scheme, have these homes repossed by the westminster office and sold off with the money being returned to the public purse. We would also like to see all MPs return all the food allowances they have claimed since this Labour Party came into Power.Housing allowances food allowances should all be scraped with imediate effect.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
